description: feed-in-profile for onshore wind power plant nearly Erfurt (middle), Nordhausen (north), Gera (east) and Hildburghausen (swest); The feed-in profiles are based on weather data from Meteonorm version 7.3.4.21143. Wind speed at a heigh of 10 meters is obtianed from the weather data and then scaled to the turbine hub heigh using the Hellman's exponent equation, as described in {1}. The adjusted wind speed is then used to calculate the power output based onthe power curve of teh Enercon E101 wind turbine, enablin the generation of realistic wind energy feed-in profiles for the locations. The data was collected in the ZO.RRO II project by Nordhausen University of Applied Sciences

context.contact: University of Applied Sciences; Institute for Renewable Energy Technology

sources.title: Regenerative Energiequellen. in Handbuch Regenerative Energietechnik, p.176
